QuestData.Title: Made for War
QuestData.Description: Jaina thinks this battle will be easily won. I intend to show her how wrong she is!$b$bThe Kirin Tor brought a weapon with them that must be destroyed. The Arcane Destroyer is a large construct capable of turning the tides of war in their favor.$b$bDestroying this monstrosity would send a very clear message to Proudmoore.
